content: Does the touchstone for server support auto record of auditEvent events for API accessesÂ¿
No Mr Moehrke, WildFHIR (Touchstone's reference server) is not currently configured to auto-create auditEvents as records for API access.
Thank you Mr Moehrke. Can it be configured to do that?
the third Mr Moehrke is working on an audit log analysis app, and needs servers that do that auto logging.
Thank you for your interest Mr Moehrke, audit logging is on our radar and we may have it ready for you and Mr Moehrke to test during the next Connectathon.
